decks.notes: This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, hand disruption, and removal spells. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Negation, and Fatal Push, the deck aims to control the board and prevent the opponent from executing their game plan. The inclusion of creatures like Murktide Regent and Harbinger of the Seas provides additional threats while the card advantage from spells like Thought Scour and Cling to Dust keeps the control engine running smoothly. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent and secure victory through strategic control of the game.

This deck focuses on quick aggression with creatures like Emperor of Bones and Overlord of the Balemurk, backed up by disruption and removal spells like Thoughtseize and Fatal Push. It also utilizes flicker effects like Ephemerate and Flickerwisp to re-trigger powerful enter-the-battlefield abilities and disrupt opponent's plans. The inclusion of cards like Relic of Progenitus and Psychic Frog helps control the opponent's graveyard and draw options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive threats and disruptive spells, creating a challenging board state for them to navigate.

Utilizing a combination of instant speed reanimation spells and powerful combo pieces, this deck aims to quickly bring back high impact creatures like Emperor of Bones and Griselbrand from the graveyard to the battlefield. Ephemerate and Goryo's Vengeance provide crucial reanimation effects, while cards like Faithful Mending and Prismatic Ending offer utility and disruption. With a mix of control elements like Force of Negation and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student, as well as powerful finishers like Solitude and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, this deck can quickly overwhelm opponents with its explosive plays and versatile threats.

This deck focuses on fast mana generation and disruption to enable a quick combo win using cards like Goblin Charbelcher. It utilizes cards like Disrupting Shoal, Stern Scolding, and Spell Snare to prevent opponents from interfering with the combo. Key components include Lotus Bloom for mana acceleration, Thundertrap Trainer for extra damage, and Tameshi, Reality Architect for additional combo potential. The deck also includes a mix of control elements like Suppression Ray and disruption with cards like Sink into Stupor. The goal is to assemble the combo pieces and execute a game-winning play before the opponent can respond.

This deck focuses on using powerful multicolored creatures and Leylines to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing a mix of mana fixing and efficient threats, the deck can apply pressure early and maintain it throughout the game. The key is to establish a strong board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan while continuing to push damage. With a combination of efficient spells and resilient creatures, this deck aims to close out games quickly and decisively.

The key concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to generate fast and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. The deck focuses on utilizing efficient creatures such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, while also including cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Goblin Bombardment for additional value and damage output. The inclusion of cards like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provide powerful finishers to close out games quickly. The deck also includes disruption elements like Extraction Specialist and Static Prison to control the board and maintain tempo.

This Mardu Aggro deck focuses on utilizing powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, supported by removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Thoughtseize to swiftly deal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison to control the board and push through for lethal attacks. With a mix of aggressive creatures and versatile spells, this deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain momentum to secure a quick victory in Modern 1 vs 1 matches.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize the Broodscale Bloodchief combo by using cards like Basking Broodscale, Glaring Fleshraker, and Blade of the Bloodchief to generate a powerful board presence. The deck also includes cards like Urza's Saga, Malevolent Rumble, and Kozilek's Command to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategies. With key cards like Emrakul, the Promised End and Walking Ballista for additional win conditions, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its combo potential and card advantage.

The main idea of this Jeskai Control deck is to maintain control of the game by using a combination of counterspells, removal, and card advantage. Cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Force of Negation help to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while cards like Prismatic Ending and Wrath of the Skies deal with threats on the board. Consign to Memory and Stock Up provide card draw and selection, while Nulldrifter and Dress Down offer additional options for control. The deck aims to outvalue the opponent and win through attrition and powerful threats like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury.

The deck focuses on playing low-cost artifacts in order to quickly establish a board presence and pressure the opponent. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble provide card advantage, while Galvanic Blast and Repeal allow for removal and disruption. Urza's Saga is a key card that can generate additional artifacts and provide a powerful enchantment for the deck. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Vivi Ornitier offer additional card advantage and utility. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggression and card advantage from its artifact-based strategy.

The deck focuses on using artifacts to generate fast mana and card advantage, while also utilizing synergies with Urza's Saga to create a powerful board presence quickly. Emry, Lurker of the Loch is used to recur artifacts from the graveyard, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card selection and disruption. The deck aims to pressure the opponent with efficient threats like Cori-Steel Cutter and Kappa Cannoneer, while disrupting their game plan with cards like Pithing Needle and Metallic Rebuke. The versatile artifact suite allows for flexibility in adapting to different matchups.

This UR Aggro deck focuses on quickly playing and buffing low-cost creatures to deal fast and efficient damage to the opponent. The deck also includes cards for card draw, spell removal, and tempo advantage. By using cards like Mutagenic Growth and Mishra's Bauble to pump up creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, along with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with swift and aggressive plays while maintaining card advantage and board presence.
